notes.authentication: Most endpoints require authentication via 'x-access-token' header or cookies
notes.fileUploads: File upload endpoints use multipart/form-data content type
notes.adminPrivileges: Some admin endpoints require adminPrivilegesRequired middleware
notes.pagination: Some list endpoints may support pagination (check controller implementation)
notes.populate: Some GET endpoints support 'populate' query parameter to include related data
